data.client_settings: Discord 7.8.8 (788) [I think it's Beta, Google Play says that]
data.actual_result: The USER:DISCRIMINATOR is really hard to read
data.expected_result: The USER:DISCRIMINATOR is supposed to be easy to read
data.short_description: The USER:DISCRIMINATOR is really hard to read when you press share on a picture/video/file.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get an Android device - Set your Appearance for Discord from Dark to Light - Take a picture/video/or have a file - Go to your file manager or something (I have a Samsung device, so just go to My Files) - Find an option to share it - Select Discord in the Share list - You will see the Message Preview - Select a random user - Check the USER:DISCRIMINATOR - It is really hard to read
